options.name: Scoundrel
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and +1 Coordination. You gain advantage on deception checks against humanoids.

options.name: Silver Tongue
options.description: Gain +1 Presence. You can use your action to attempt to confuse or distract a humanoid for 1 round.

options.name: Quick Fingers
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination. You can pick pockets or perform sleight of hand as a bonus action.

options.name: Fast on Your Feet
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Dodge. You can use the Disengage action as a bonus action.

options.name: Action : Dirty Trick
options.description: Make a Coordination check against a target's Senses. If successful, the target is Blinded or Deafened (your choice) until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Slip Away
options.description: When an enemy attacks you and misses, you can move up to half your movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

options.name: Opportunist
options.description: You deal an additional 1d6 damage with weapon attacks against creatures that are distracted, surprised, or affected by a status condition.

options.name: Free Action : Feint
options.description: As a free action, make a Presence check against a target's Senses. If successful, you gain advantage on your next attack against that target before the end of your turn.

options.name: Slippery Mind
options.description: Gain +1 Resistance and advantage on saves against mind-affecting abilities. You can use your Coordination modifier instead of your Resistance modifier for saves against such effects.

options.name: Master Scoundrel
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and +1 Coordination. Once per turn, when you hit with an attack, you can force the target to make a Resistance check or be Charmed until the end of your next turn.
